title: kerning question
content:
Hi thoughts please on the kerning of this masthead?

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMA Review Logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819023749/http:/typophile.com/files/IMA%20Review%20Logo.jpg) | 580.9 KB |
author: dendicott

comments.content: If you don’t mind the gaps caused by the diagonals you can’t get any tighter. Is that desired? Doesn’t look very good. I’d open up all the other pairs to match the gaps.
Look at EVI and EW, MA.
